page.title: 03SATURDAY MORNING--CATHERINE
page.content: {8.00}Get up and get dressed,feed my fish and open my window.For breakfast I have Cornflakes,a sausage sandwich and orange juice.8.30 Go outside and feed chickens and ducks,then let our pony,Mr.MacGreggor.8.40 Play a game.My dad is a builder and he stores all of his materials at the bottom of the garden. It's a great place to play adventure games.9.40 Exercise Mr.Macgreggor by riding him through cones and jumping him.10.15 Fill up all the animals water.10.30 Watch television. On I.T.V. I watch "73". It's about a family that live at number 73. They get lots of visitors and they have a pop group in the cellar. 12.00 go out and do any other jobs which need doing, like cleaning out the stable.1.00 Dinner!
